description: This file is a Flutter application's main entry point, defining the main widget structure including MaterialApp, MyHomePage, and UI components such as AppBar, Text, and CircularProgressIndicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application setting up the theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home screen with a customizable title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage containing the build method for rendering UI.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the app by instantiating MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and _MyHomePageState.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.
